Enjoy Photography

About Us

This is an example social project to provide photography service at an affordable price to help motivate the workers and provide joy to the people in creating memories and crafting art work via the image & video editing service. It is meant at the moment in one location in Berlin. There are also online services like photo & video editing after recieving a sample e-copy of the file, and online workshops. We are a dynamic team of Media enthusiast, our team of experts will work with you to create the perfect look for your photos and videos. Contact us or book our services and workshops via the link in the Navbar.

Book now

Services

PHOTOS & VIDEOS & EDITING

Transform your moments into great pieces with our Professional Photo & Video Editing Services. We offer a wide range of services including photo retouching, color correction, and video editing.

PHOTO PRINTING AND ENLARGMENT

We can help you with your photo and video editing needs, whether it is for a wedding, birthday, or any other event. We also provide photo printing and enlargement services to help you create beautiful memories.

INFOGRAPHICS DESIGN

Create with us your visual representations such as Flyers, diagrams, easy to understand eye-catching Informative images. Perfect for Marketing Campaigns, Social Media Posts, & more.

INFOGRAPHICS WORKSHOPS

Dive into learning how to create infographics & how to use the camera with lighting & angles and contrast colours on designing. This can be done on cite or online. Available every 1st saturday of the month.
